name: Low-Level Henchman
description: A dedicated servant of Dr. Hallervorden, but weak and with few skills

name: Mid-Grade Henchman
description: A cut above your average henchman

name: Elite Henchman
description: An athletic, combat-trained henchman thirsty for blood

name: Evil Nurse
description: An assistant to the "researchers" in Dr. Hallervorden's lab

name: Technician
description: A hunchbacked servant of Dr. Hallervorden who fixes the lab

name: Insane Test Subject
description: A test subject just like you, but no longer able to tell friend from foe

name: Raptor
description: A raptor cloned from DNA trapped in amber. With a laser attached to its head.

name: Pig
description: A pig used for illegal medical testing. It isn't happy.

name: Rabbit
description: A rabbit that has been implanted with assorted experimental chemicals

name: Beagle
description: A beagle with a surgically enhanced heart. It is relentless.

name: Monkey
description: A monkey that has been used for testing experimental cosmetics. The monkey's face has a nice blush to it, but it's not pretty when it's angry.
